H0.text: Color is the property of an object that describes how easily electricity travels through it.

H1.text: Temperature is the property of an object that describes how easily electricity travels through it.

H2.text: Reflectivity is the property of an object that describes how easily electricity travels through it.

H3.text: Conductivity is the property of an object that describes how easily electricity travels through it.

A4.text: Electrical conductivity... represents a material's ability to conduct electric current.

A5.text: The electrical resistivity of most materials changes with temperature.
